amendment.description: To make available from Other Procurement, Navy, up to $3,000,000 for the Man Overboard Identification System Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4770 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4770 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S8571-8572; text: CR S8571) To make available from Other Procurement, Navy, up to $3,000,000 for the Man Overboard Identification System Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4770 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4770 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lugar.
